overview: A long and vivid nightmare... or is it an erotic dream? Our heroine is beautiful - her hair is cut short and matted down on her head. In her dreams, she is a prostitute. She is treated like an object by the men. When our heroine awakes, she finds herself in the loving arms of her husband, comforting her and letting her know it's going to be okay.
title: La moglie schiava
